text: Kare-ra (ijū-sha, enjo-sha) no nochi ni kita-sha-tachi wa,(inotte) `omo yo, watashi-tachi to, watashi-tachi izen ni shinkō ni haitta kyōdai-tachi o, o yurushi kudasai. Shinkō shite iru mono ni taisuru urami kokoro o, watashi-tachi no mune no naka ni mota senaide kudasai. Omo yo, hontōni anata wa, shinsetsude jihibukaku ara remasu.' To iu
